posts.postText: Hello, I have Bird Flu already working with me, but I feel bad for him since I put this much work on him, I just need a game mode or two created. It would help lots. Well if you wish to contact me via steam I always have it open, but my current name is [NNJG]Nolskeys . Again, thanks for the help.
